comment:
DEFICIENCY FOUND - Placeholder content detected.

Location: Section 5.2 Dockerfile, lines 102-103
Content: '# RUN npm install -g @anthropic/claude-code' with comment '(placeholder - actual install method TBD)'

Per QA zero-tolerance policy, placeholder content (TBD, TODO, FIXME) is grounds for rejection.

REQUIRED ACTION: Either (1) provide the actual Claude Code installation method, (2) remove the commented line entirely if installation is out of scope, or (3) document that installation will be handled via alternative mechanism (volume mount, manual step, etc.).

All other content verified:
- Frontmatter: title = 'Implement Containerized Claude Agent Infrastructure' (compliant)
- Frontmatter: revision_summary = 'Move docker/ to project root (decoupled from .claude/)' (compliant)
- Sections 1-9: All present and complete
- File paths: All use docker/ at project root (compliant)
- Parent reference: CR-042 (compliant)

One deficiency must be corrected before recommendation.

Re-review complete. Previous deficiency resolved.

VERIFIED:
- Frontmatter title: 'Implement Containerized Claude Agent Infrastructure' (compliant)
- Frontmatter revision_summary: 'Address QA feedback - remove TBD placeholder, specify Claude Code installation' (compliant, reflects revision)
- TBD placeholder removed: Lines 101-106 now contain concrete implementation (nodejs, npm dependencies; npm install -g @anthropic/claude-code)
- CMD updated from ['bash'] to ['claude']
- Explanatory note added at line 121 for potential execution-phase updates
- No placeholder content (TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX) detected

- File paths: All use docker/ at project root (compliant)
- Formatting: Consistent throughout

Document is compliant and ready for approval.

Post-execution review COMPLIANT. (2) All 12 EIs have Task Outcome=Pass. (3) VAR-001 (Type 1) is CLOSED. (4) VAR-002 (Type 2) is PRE_APPROVED. (7) No placeholder content (TBD/TODO/FIXME). (8) Document structure complete per SOP-002 Section 6. RECOMMEND for post-approval.
